message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_PARENTCASE
message.locale: The parent case id must be entered.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_INTEGRATEDCASE
message.locale: The case under appeal must not be an integrated case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_ACTIVEREVIEW
message.locale: There is already an active hearing review on this case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_APPELLANT
message.locale: An appellant must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_ORGASAPPELLANT
message.locale: The organization must be the appellant on this case.
The organisation must be the appellant on this case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_RESPONDENT
message.locale: A respondent must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_ORGASRESPONDENT
message.locale: The organization must be the respondent on this case.
The organisation must be the respondent on this case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_PARTASRESPONDENT
message.locale: The participant must be the respondent on this case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_NOAPPELLANTORRESPONDENT
message.locale: An appellant and respondent must be specified.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_APPELLANTONORIGCASE
message.locale: The appellant was not a participant on the original case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_RESPONDENTONORIGCASE
message.locale: The respondent was not a participant on the original case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_HEARINGREVIEWLINKCOMPLETE
message.locale: A hearing review must be linked to a completed hearing case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_HEARINGREVIEWLINK
message.locale: A hearing review must be linked to a hearing case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_CASEPARTICIPANT
message.locale: The appellant cannot be both the Organization and a participant.
The appellant cannot be both the Organisation and a participant.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_ORGINDICATOR
message.locale: The organization cannot be both the appellant and the respondent.
The organisation cannot be both the appellant and the respondent.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_CASEAPPELLANT
message.locale: The respondent participant must be an appellant on the original case.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_CASEAPPELLANTORTHIRDPARTY
message.locale: The appellant participant must be an appellant or third party on the original case.

message.name: INF_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_CASEUNDERAPPEAL
message.locale: The case %1s is under appeal.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_APPELLANTASBOTH
message.locale: The appellant cannot be both the organization and a participant.
The appellant cannot be both the organisation and a participant.

message.name: ERR_HEARINGREVIEW_FV_RESPONDENTASBOTH
message.locale: The respondent cannot be both the organization and a participant.
The respondent cannot be both the organisation and a participant.

message.name: INF_HEARINGREVIEW_SUBJECTTEXT
message.locale: Appeal Notice

message.name: INF_HEARINREVIEW_SUBJECTTEXT
message.locale: Hearing Review
